conbody.p: Eucalyptus 3.1 contains features listed in the following table.

row.entry: FastStart is an automated installer for an entry level Eucalyptus cloud. FastStart is useful for infrastructure administrators who want to get started with an Infrastructure as a Service cloud quickly. FastStart can be configured on CentOS 5 with Xen or CentOS 6 with KVM.
Eucalyptus 3.1 has added support for Ubuntu 12.04 (Precise) and CentOS 6.x. These platforms are supported for all Eucalyptus front-end management services as well as Node Controllers.
Eucalyptus VMware Broker now fully supports the lastest vSphere 5 API and platform.
